0110010010000010 0001010010010110 1 -> sum: 0111100100011001, cout: 0
0101111101010101 1100110111000001 1 -> sum: 0010110100010111, cout: 1
0011001111001000 0010010011010111 0 -> sum: 0101100010011111, cout: 0
1011000101111101 0000110100111000 0 -> sum: 1011111010110101, cout: 0
0110000111111010 1111110000101011 1 -> sum: 0101111000100110, cout: 1
0000000111011101 0100101100100011 0 -> sum: 0100110100000000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
